title: [M1 Mac] 一个关于npm安装失败并出现chromium错误以及如何处理的故事。
body:
## 错误描述。

```bash
npm ERR! code 1
npm ERR! path /Users/kemu/workspace/***/node_modules/puppeteer
npm ERR! command failed
npm ERR! command sh -c node install.js
npm ERR! The chromium binary is not available for arm64: 
npm ERR! If you are on Ubuntu, you can install with: 
npm ERR! 
npm ERR!  apt-get install chromium-browser
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! /Users/kemu/workspace/***/node_modules/puppeteer/lib/cjs/puppeteer/node/BrowserFetcher.js:112
npm ERR!             throw new Error();
npm ERR!             ^
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Error
npm ERR!     at /Users/kemu/workspace/***/node_modules/puppeteer/lib/cjs/puppeteer/node/BrowserFetcher.js:112:19
npm ERR!     at FSReqCallback.oncomplete (node:fs:198:21)

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /Users/kemu/.npm/_logs/2022-06-28T15_06_36_606Z-debug.log
```

##支持。

安装chromium

```bash
$ brew install chromium
```

在.zprofile中添加以下内容

```bash
export PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true
export PUPPETEER_EXECUTABLE_PATH=`which chromium`
```

重新加载zprofile。

```bash
$ source ~/.zprofile
```
